item.title: Kaira Can Company Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.1420 Amid Market Pressure
item.description: Shares of Kaira Can Company touched a fresh 52-week low of Rs.1420 today, marking a significant decline amid broader market fluctuations and sector-specific pressures. The stock’s performance contrasts with the broader Sensex, which remains near its yearly highs despite a recent downward trend. Time: 13 minutes ago

item.title: Jubilant Foodworks Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.564.4 Amid Market Pressure
item.description: Jubilant Foodworks has reached a new 52-week low of Rs.564.4, marking a significant decline in its share price amid broader market fluctuations and sectoral pressures. item.title: Covidh Technologies Hits New 52-Week High of Rs.13.97 Marking Significant Rally

item.title: SBC Exports Stock Hits All-Time High Marking Significant Milestone
item.description: SBC Exports, a prominent player in the Garments & Apparels sector, has reached an all-time high in its stock price, underscoring a remarkable trajectory of growth and resilience. This milestone reflects the company’s sustained performance across multiple time frames, positioning it as a noteworthy contender within its industry. Time: 41 minutes ago

item.title: Destiny Logistics & Infra Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Destiny Logistics & Infra Ltd witnessed a sharp decline on 16 Dec 2025, hitting its lower circuit price limit as intense selling pressure gripped the stock. The transport services company recorded a maximum daily loss of 4.98%, underperforming both its sector and the broader market indices, signalling a wave of panic selling and unfilled supply on the trading floor. Time: 56 minutes ago

item.title: Supreme Engineering Hits Lower Circuit Amid Heavy Selling Pressure
item.description: Shares of Supreme Engineering Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Iron & Steel Products sector, plunged to their lower circuit limit on 16 Dec 2025, reflecting intense selling pressure and a sharp decline in investor sentiment. The stock closed at ₹1.30, marking a maximum daily loss of 4.41%, significantly underperforming both its sector and the broader market indices. Time: 56 minutes ago
